comments.body: I read this name incorrectly the first time.  I thought it would be a collection of RNTuples (i.e. a TChain .. )

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +201,205 @@// clang-format off
/**
\class ROOT::Experimental::RCollectionNTuple
\ingroup NTuple
\brief A virtual ntuple for collections that can be used to some extent like a real ntuple
